trans-unit.source: Layouts
trans-unit.target: Layouts

trans-unit.source: Layouts are a special type of views that represent the common parts of multiple views. For example, the pages for most Web applications share the same page header and footer. While you can repeat the same page header and footer in every view, a better way is to do this once in a layout and embed the rendering result of a content view at an appropriate place in the layout.
trans-unit.target: 布局是一种特殊类型的视图,它表示多个视图的共同部分。例如,大多数Web应用程序的页面都共享相同的页眉和页脚。虽然您可以在每个视图中重复使用相同的页面页眉和页脚,但更好的方法是在布局中做一次,并在布局的适当位置嵌入内容视图的渲染结果。

trans-unit.source: Like accessing controllers in an application, routes are used to address controllers in a module. A route for a controller within a module must begin with the module ID followed by the controller ID and action ID. For example, if an application uses a module named forum, then the route forum/post/index would represent the index action of the post controller in the module. If the route only contains the module ID, then the yii\base\Module::$defaultRoute property, which defaults to default, will determine which controller/action should be used. This means a route forum would represent the default controller in the forum module.
trans-unit.target: 像访问应用程序中的控制器一样，路由用于寻址模块中的控制器。模块内控制器的路由必须以模块ID开头，后跟控制器ID和操作ID。例如，如果应用程序使用名为 forum 的模块，则路由 forum/post/index 将代表模块中 post 控制器的 index 操作。如果路由仅包含模块ID，则默认为 default 的yii \ base \ Module :: $ defaultRoute属性将确定应使用哪个控制器/操作。这意味着路线 forum 将代表 forum 模块中的 default 控制器。

trans-unit.source: Like browser redirection, file sending is another feature that relies on specific HTTP headers. Yii provides a set of methods to support various file sending needs. They all have built-in support for the HTTP range header.
trans-unit.target: 像浏览器重定向一样,文件发送是另一个依赖于特定HTTP头的功能。Yii提供了一套方法来支持各种文件发送需求。它们都内置了对HTTP范围头的支持。

Since version 2.0.10 action IDs can be specified as wildcards, e.g. site/*.

trans-unit.source: List of possible patterns and the corresponding actions for creating the URL rules. The keys are the patterns and the values are the corresponding actions. The format of patterns is Verbs Pattern, where Verbs stands for a list of HTTP verbs separated by comma (without space). If Verbs is not specified, it means all verbs are allowed. Pattern is optional. It will be prefixed with $prefix/$controller/, and tokens in it will be replaced by $tokens.
trans-unit.target: 可能的模式列表以及用于创建URL规则的相应操作。键是模式，值是相应的操作。模式的格式为 Verbs Pattern ，其中 Verbs 代表由逗号分隔的HTTP动词列表（无空格）。如果未指定 Verbs ，则表示允许所有动词。 Pattern 是可选的。它将以$ prefix / $ controller / 作为前缀，并且其中的令牌将由$ tokens替换。

trans-unit.source: Make sure the record has been fetched with a \yii\elasticsearch\version before. This is only the case for records fetched via get() and mget() by default. For normal queries, the _version field has to be fetched explicitly.
trans-unit.target: 确保之前已使用\ yii \ elasticsearch \ version获取记录。默认情况下，只有通过get（）和mget（）获取的记录才有这种情况。对于普通查询，必须明确获取 _version 字段。

trans-unit.source: Make sure the value is of type integer, e.g. casting a string '42' to integer 42. Here we set $skipOnEmpty to true, which is false by default on the filter validator.
trans-unit.target: 确保该值是整数类型，例如，将字符串 '42' 强制转换为整数 42 。这里我们设置$ skipOnEmpty到 true ，这是 false 默认的过滤器验证。

trans-unit.source: Many DBMS support database replication to get better database availability and faster server response time. With database replication, data are replicated from the so-called master servers to slave servers. All writes and updates must take place on the master servers, while reads may also take place on the slave servers.
trans-unit.target: 许多DBMS支持数据库复制以获得更好的数据库可用性和更快的服务器响应时间。通过数据库复制，数据从所谓的主服务器复制到从属服务器。所有写入和更新都必须在主服务器上进行，而读取也可能在从属服务器上进行。

trans-unit.source: Massive assignment is a convenient way of populating a model with user inputs using a single line of code. It populates the attributes of a model by assigning the input data directly to the yii\base\Model::$attributes property. The following two pieces of code are equivalent, both trying to assign the form data submitted by end users to the attributes of the ContactForm model. Clearly, the former, which uses massive assignment, is much cleaner and less error prone than the latter:
trans-unit.target: 大规模分配是使用单行代码用用户输入填充模型的便捷方法。它通过直接将输入数据分配给yii \ base \ Model :: $ attributes属性来填充模型的属性。以下两段代码是等效的，它们都试图将最终用户提交的表单数据分配给 ContactForm 模型的属性。显然，前者使用大量分配，比后者更干净，更不容易出错：

trans-unit.source: Massive assignment only applies to the so-called safe attributes which are the attributes listed in yii\base\Model::scenarios() for the current scenario of a model. For example, if the User model has the following scenario declaration, then when the current scenario is login, only the username and password can be massively assigned. Any other attributes will be kept untouched.
trans-unit.target: 大规模的分配只适用于所谓的安全属性，这是在列出的属性警予\基地\型号::场景（）为当前场景的模型的。例如，如果 User 模型具有以下方案声明，则当当前方案为 login 时，只能大规模分配 username 和 password 。其他所有属性将保持不变。

trans-unit.source: Migration namespaces should be resolvable as a path alias if prefixed with @, e.g. if you specify the namespace app\migrations, the code Yii::getAlias('@app/migrations') should be able to return the file path to the directory this namespace refers to. This corresponds with the autoloading conventions of Yii.
trans-unit.target: 如果以 @ Yii::getAlias('@app/migrations') ，则迁移名称空间应可解析为路径别名，例如，如果您指定名称空间 app\migrations ，则代码Yii :: getAlias（'@ app / migrations'）应该能够将文件路径返回到该目录命名空间是指。这与Yii 的自动加载约定相对应。

trans-unit.source: Migration provides a set of convenient methods for manipulating MongoDB data and schema. For example, the createIndex() method can be used to create a collection index. Compared with the same methods in yii\mongodb\Collection, these methods will display extra information showing the method parameters and execution time, which may be useful when applying migrations.
trans-unit.target: 迁移提供了一组方便的方法来处理MongoDB数据和架构。例如，createIndex（）方法可用于创建集合索引。与yii \ mongodb \ Collection中的相同方法相比，这些方法将显示额外的信息，这些信息显示了方法参数和执行时间，这在应用迁移时可能很有用。

trans-unit.source: Migration provides a set of convenient methods for manipulating database data and schema. For example, the insert() method can be used to easily insert a row of data into a database table; the createTable() method can be used to create a database table. Compared with the same methods in yii\db\Command, these methods will display extra information showing the method parameters and execution time, which may be useful when applying migrations.
trans-unit.target: 迁移提供了一组方便的方法来处理数据库数据和架构。例如，insert（）方法可用于轻松地将一行数据插入数据库表中。所述CREATETABLE（）方法可用于创建数据库表。与yii \ db \ Command中的相同方法相比，这些方法将显示额外的信息，这些信息显示了方法参数和执行时间，这在应用迁移时可能很有用。

trans-unit.source: Models are part of the MVC architecture. They are objects representing business data, rules and logic.
trans-unit.target: 模型是MVC体系结构的一部分。它们是代表业务数据，规则和逻辑的对象。

trans-unit.source: Models are part of the MVC architecture. They are objects representing business data, rules and logic.
trans-unit.target: 模型是MVC体系结构的一部分。它们是代表业务数据，规则和逻辑的对象。

trans-unit.source: Models are the central places to represent business data, rules and logic. They often need to be reused in different places. In a well-designed application, models are usually much fatter than controllers.
trans-unit.target: 模型是表示业务数据，规则和逻辑的中心位置。它们通常需要在不同的地方重复使用。在设计良好的应用程序中，模型通常比控制器要胖得多。

trans-unit.source: Models often need to be exported in different formats. For example, you may want to convert a collection of models into JSON or Excel format. The exporting process can be broken down into two independent steps:
trans-unit.target: 模型经常需要以不同的格式导出。例如,您可能希望将模型集合转换为 JSON 或 Excel 格式。导出过程可分为两个独立的步骤。

trans-unit.source: Models represent business data in terms of attributes. Each attribute is like a publicly accessible property of a model. The method yii\base\Model::attributes() specifies what attributes a model class has.
trans-unit.target: 模型用属性表示业务数据。每个属性都像模型的公共可访问属性。该方法警予\基地\型号::属性（）指定什么属性模型类了。

trans-unit.source: Modern web applications, additionally to static HTML pages that are rendered and sent to the browser, contain JavaScript that is used to modify the page in the browser by manipulating existing elements or loading new content via AJAX. This section describes methods provided by Yii for adding JavaScript and CSS to a website as well as dynamically adjusting these.
trans-unit.target: 现代的网络应用,除了静态的HTML页面被渲染和发送到浏览器之外,还包含JavaScript,通过AJAX操作现有的元素或加载新的内容来修改页面。本节介绍了Yii提供的为网站添加JavaScript和CSS的方法,以及动态调整这些方法。

trans-unit.target: 模块（ID =>模块配置或实例）。

trans-unit.source: Modules are also a good way of reusing code at the feature group level. Some commonly used features, such as user management, comment management, can all be developed in terms of modules so that they can be reused easily in future projects.
trans-unit.target: 在功能组层面,模块也是重用代码的好方法。一些常用的功能,如用户管理、评论管理,都可以用模块的方式来开发,这样在以后的项目中就可以很方便地重复使用。

trans-unit.source: Modules are best used in large applications whose features can be divided into several groups, each consisting of a set of closely related features. Each such feature group can be developed as a module which is developed and maintained by a specific developer or team.
trans-unit.target: 模块最好用在大型应用程序中,这些应用程序的功能可分为若干组,每组由一组密切相关的功能组成。每个特征组都可以作为一个模块开发,由特定的开发人员或团队开发和维护。

trans-unit.source: Modules are self-contained software units that consist of models, views, controllers, and other supporting components. End users can access the controllers of a module when it is installed in application. For these reasons, modules are often viewed as mini-applications. Modules differ from applications in that modules cannot be deployed alone and must reside within applications.
trans-unit.target: 模块是独立的软件单元，由模型，视图，控制器和其他支持组件组成。当模块安装在应用程序中时，最终用户可以访问该模块的控制器。由于这些原因，模块通常被视为小型应用程序。模块与应用程序的不同之处在于，模块不能单独部署，必须驻留在应用程序内。

trans-unit.source: Most JavaScript/CSS packages are managed by Bower and/or NPM package managers. In PHP world we have Composer, that manages PHP dependencies, but it is possible to load both Bower and NPM packages using composer.json just as PHP packages.

trans-unit.source: Most JavaScript/CSS packages are managed by Bower and/or NPM package managers. In PHP world we have Composer, that manages PHP dependencies, but it is possible to load both Bower and NPM packages using composer.json just as PHP packages.
trans-unit.target: 大多数JavaScript / CSS程序包由Bower和/或NPM程序包管理器管理。在PHP世界中，我们有Composer，它管理PHP依赖关系，但是可以像PHP包一样使用 composer.json 加载Bower和NPM包。

trans-unit.source: Most JavaScript/CSS packages are managed using Bower and/or NPM, instead of Composer. Yii uses the Composer asset plugin to enable managing these kinds of packages through Composer. trans-unit.source: Most developers know that passwords cannot be stored in plain text, but many developers believe it's still safe to hash passwords using md5 or sha1. There was a time when using the aforementioned hashing algorithms was sufficient, but modern hardware makes it possible to reverse such hashes and even stronger ones very quickly using brute force attacks.
trans-unit.target: 大多数开发人员都知道密码不能以纯文本形式存储，但是许多开发人员认为使用 md5 或 sha1 散列密码仍然是安全的。曾经有一段时间使用上述哈希算法就足够了，但是现代硬件可以使用蛮力攻击非常快速地逆转此类哈希甚至是更强的哈希。

trans-unit.source: Most validators have default error messages that will be added to the model being validated when its attributes fail the validation. For example, the required validator will add a message "Username cannot be blank." to a model when the username attribute fails the rule using this validator.
trans-unit.target: 大多数验证器具有默认错误消息，当其属性未通过验证时，这些错误消息将添加到正在验证的模型中。例如，所需的验证器将添加一条消息“用户名不能为空”。当 username 属性使用此验证器的规则失败时，将其添加到模型。

trans-unit.source: MySQL implementation of batch queries relies on the PDO driver library. By default, MySQL queries are buffered. This defeats the purpose of using the cursor to get the data, because it doesn't prevent the whole result set from being loaded into the client's memory by the driver.
trans-unit.target: MySQL的批处理查询实现依赖于PDO驱动程序库。默认情况下，MySQL查询被 buffered 。这违反了使用游标获取数据的目的，因为它不会阻止驱动程序将整个结果集加载到客户端的内存中。

trans-unit.target: 接下来，单击“预览”按钮。您会看到在要创建的结果类文件中列出了 models/Country.php 。您可以单击类文件的名称来预览其内容。

trans-unit.source: Next, click on the "Preview" button. You will see a list of files to be generated, as shown below.
trans-unit.target: 接下来,点击 "预览 "按钮。你会看到一个要生成的文件列表,如下图所示。

trans-unit.source: Next, configure authManager by listing the two roles in yii\rbac\BaseManager::$defaultRoles:
trans-unit.target: 接下来，通过列出 authManager \ rbac \ BaseManager :: $ defaultRoles中的两个角色来配置authManager：

trans-unit.source: Next, create a file input in a view:
trans-unit.target: 接下来,在视图中创建一个文件输入。

trans-unit.source: Next, you need to register your package for Composer's sake. For public templates, the package should be registered at Packagist. For private templates, it is a bit more tricky to register the package. For instructions, see the Composer documentation.
trans-unit.target: 接下来，需要为Composer注册您的软件包。对于公共模板，该软件包应在Packagist上注册。对于私有模板，注册程序包比较麻烦。有关说明，请参见Composer文档。

trans-unit.source: Next, you will see a confirmation page indicating the code has been successfully generated. If you had an existing file, you'll also see a message indicating that it was overwritten with the newly generated code.
trans-unit.target: 接下来,你会看到一个确认页面,表明代码已经成功生成。如果你有一个现有的文件,你还会看到一条消息,表明它被新生成的代码覆盖了。

trans-unit.source: Next, you'll want to modify the composer.json to reflect your template. Change the name, description, keywords, homepage, license, and support values to describe your new template. Also adjust the require, require-dev, suggest, and other options to match your template's requirements.
trans-unit.target: 接下来，您将需要修改 composer.json 以反映您的模板。更改 name ， description ， keywords ， homepage ， license 和 support 值以描述您的新模板。还要调整 require ， require-dev ， suggest 和其他选项以匹配模板的需求。

trans-unit.source: Note that a behavior class must extend from yii\base\Behavior. Behaviors can be attached using a name or anonymously. trans-unit.source: Note that attribute typecast is performed only during populating ActiveRecord instance from query result. There is no automatic conversion for the values loaded from HTTP request or set directly via property access. The table schema will also be used while preparing SQL statements for the ActiveRecord data saving, ensuring values are bound to the query with correct type. However, ActiveRecord instance attribute values will not be converted during saving process.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,属性类型转换只在从查询结果填充ActiveRecord实例时进行。对于从HTTP请求加载的值或直接通过属性访问设置的值,没有自动转换。在准备SQL语句时,表模式也将被用于ActiveRecord数据保存,确保值以正确的类型绑定到查询中。然而,ActiveRecord实例属性值在保存过程中不会被转换。

trans-unit.source: Note that by enabling RBAC cache, all auth items, rules and auth item parent-child relationships will be cached and loaded into memory. This will improve the performance of RBAC permission check. However, it does require extra memory and as a result may not be appropriate if your RBAC system contains too many auth items. You should seek other RBAC implementations (e.g. RBAC based on Redis storage) in this case.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,通过启用RBAC缓存,所有的认证项目、规则和认证项目父子关系将被缓存并加载到内存中。这将提高RBAC权限检查的性能。然而,它确实需要额外的内存,因此,如果你的RBAC系统包含了太多的auth项目,它可能不合适。在这种情况下,你应该寻求其他的RBAC实现(例如基于Redis存储的RBAC)。
